name: InspiringAdventuresWordoftheWeek
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: The intent for Inspiring Adventures Word of the Week is to give a starting point for each week's focus. Melissa Reyes, also known as Miz Meliz, a certified professional life coach, shares a word drawn from her Daily Affirmations Card Deck and offers insights on that subject. Listeners are encouraged to reflect on the word throughout the week and journal about how it applies to them. Melissa can be reached through her Facebook Group, Inspiring Adventures or on her website MizMeliz.com.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
